resources.string:
If you find a bug with any of these settings, post in the Bug Reports section of our Google+ page. You MUST include the following when posting a bug report:

1. A logcat or last_kmsg
2. Kernel and mods used
3. Useful information

If you fail to report something adequately, DO NOT expect things to be fixed.
Enable notification panel header weather display
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Right edge of the statusbar pulls down Quick Settings
Display the number of pending notifications
Double-tap on the statusbar or top third and bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to turn off the display
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Enable notification for when the flashlight is on
Pressing the home button will wake your device
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the arrows in the traffic indicators
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Press on color below to apply
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth Lava Lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset SmartBar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing or music is playing
Set how long the system will wait before triggering a longpress action
Show a Do not Disturb switch in the volume panel
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your SMS notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Adjust brightness by sliding across the statusbar
Customize the shortcut icons in the corners
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Adjust the time for when a screenshot is captured
This will hide all force close notifications
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Disable quick settings tiles on secured lockscreen
Enables the navbar to adapt app\'s primary dark color. Restart your desired app to see effect.
To allow applications to display interactive notifications in a pop-up window on your screen, enable Heads up.
Show heads up for dialer even if heads up is off to avoid fullscreen dialer on incoming calls
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
View or change power menu entries
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Show power menu on secure lock screen
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Force volume keys to control media stream
Display charger current, voltage and battery temperature on the lockscreen while charging
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Allow to set the same icon style chosen for the statusbar battery
Show percentage near battery when charging
Show the battery percentage outside the icon when charging
Show the battery percentage inside the icon when charging
Show a symbol near percentage text outside the battery icon when charging
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel
Blur the background when you pull down the statusbar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the background of expanded statusbar
Blur the background of recent apps
Blur personlizations are disabled during Keyguard view. Only Translucent Notifications are enabled.

These colors are the ones tiniting the BlurBackground.\nInstead of the normal Grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like.\nThere are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for Dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds.
Blur personlizations are disabled during Keyguard view. Only Translucent Notifications are enabled.
Disables transition animations such as when launching an app
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Swipe three fingers across the screen to screenshot
When wired headset is plugged in
When BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When BT headset is plugged in
When wired or BT headset (no carkit) is plugged in
When wired or BT headset is plugged in
Disable the settings shortcut in the header
Disable the running services icon in the header
Disable the edit icon in the header
Disable the multi-user switch in the header
Disable the expand indicator in the header
Requires one or more icons to be disabled
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
For better visibility on bright images
Long press on any image to use for static mode
Double tap on navbar empty areas to switch off the screen
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Actions will be executed on screen off. Previous state will be restored when display is turned on.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
QS tiles titles are now visible
QS tiles titles are now gone
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern.\nUse at your own risk.
Wired headset if connected and playing music
Enable one tap action to enable/disable mobile data, wifi, location and bluetooth
Enable Do not Disturb when call active
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Use slim recents instead of the default recents view
View the settings for slim recents
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Are you sure you want to reset Slim Recent to stock color?
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Show an editor window after taking a screenshot in order to do some operations like cropping, saving or sharing it
Show battery status for the currently connected bluetooth device, if available.
Show the left statusbar clock on the keyguard
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Failed to uninstall, check root access
Show screen pinning icon in grid style recents
Screen pinning icon will be shown in grid style recents if screen pinning is enabled from security settings
Screen pinning icon will be hidden in grid style recents even if screen pinning is enabled from security settings
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
